txt.en:
This hastily scribbled note reads:

'To those who remain, I wish you the best. For the past months and days, there have been grim portents of what is to come. Shadows are falling all around us, and we fear what may come. The cairns stir for the first time in this place.'

You should bring this note to Bledhun.
'I am relieved to hear that more survived the attack than I first thought, but I fear what is to become of this place.'
This note tells of several other survivors of the attack on Bledhun's band. These people have fled northwards, as grim portents have spoken of dark times ahead.
Talk to Bledhun at his encampment in the Bonevales
Bledhun's encampment is in the east of the Bonevales.\n\nYou should bring the note you found to Bledhun.
